articles.description: The next pandemic could come from the Amazon rainforest, warns Brazilian ecologist David Lapola, who says human encroachment on animals' habitats - a likely culprit in the coronavirus outbreak - is soaring there because of rampant deforestation.
articles.content:

articles.title: Coronavirus: How 'overreaction' made Vietnam a virus success - BBC News
articles.description: Vietnam chose to prevent rather than fight Covid-19, a strategy which means it has had no virus deaths.
articles.content:
